FuncDef: This command specifies theisa-radius-policyused for accounting messages originated from the ISAs in thewlan-gwgroup. The policy can specify up to five accounting servers and configuration-specific to these accounting servers. It also specifies configuration specific to RADIUS client on ISAs and RADIUS attributes to be included in accounting messages.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the account policy up to 32 characters.
